title: Important: nghttp2 security update
description:
libnghttp2 is a library implementing the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2 (HTTP/2) protocol in C.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2020-11080 is retrieved from Red Hat
